astraiea.layer2.strategies

Class CensoringStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • astraiea.layer2.strategies.CensoringStrategy

  • public class CensoringStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about what approach should be taken if censored tests are used but the first one does not return significance. FIXME Refactoring 27/11 - Now non stateful. Censoring is a multi step process that has to separately execute and return each step as the outcome of other parts of Astraiea (tests in layer1, incrementing etc.) determines whether the next step is carried out. This was previously done with a stateful counter. Now the counter is a parameter each step.
    Author:
    Geoffrey Neumann

      Returns true if more strategies than just the initial final point in the test strategy will be used.

      Returns a textual description of strategy which has just been used.
